data.title: Get your turkey fresh
data.text: I can find freshly prepared meats and frozen meats already for the oven. If you want a special cut, they will do it for you  and give ideas about how to cook it.

data.title: Great Sandwiches - The Freshest Meats
data.text:
Lutz's Pork Store has been a staple in Union Center for decades.  With it's roots as a German butcher shop, Lutz's makes many of its own pork and beef based cold cuts and meat products on premises.  The result is unmatched freshness and superior taste.  With a nice variety of fresh specialty rolls and breads always on hand, Lutz's is our "go to" place for the very best sandwiches in town.  There's no seating at Lutz's - it's all take out.  

Of course, as an "all around" butcher shop, we feel that Lutz's can't be beat!
